articles.title: PepsiCo to Debut ‘Simply NKD' Cheetos, Doritos, Free of Artificial Dyes
articles.author: Elizabeth Weibel
articles.summary: PepsiCo is launching 'Simply NKD' Cheetos and Doritos on December 1, which are versions of the snacks without artificial dyes. This introduction aims to meet consumer demand for additive options, while the original Cheetos and Doritos remain available.

articles.title: Walmart has $88 salon-grade ionic blow dryer on sale for shocking $20 – but not for long
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: Nexpure is launching the Professional Ionic Hair Dryer, featuring a lightweight design, 1800-watt motor, ionic and bioceramic technology, and included smoothing nozzle and diffuser attachments. Available at Walmart from November 14-16, it's on sale for $25, with an additional $5 coupon, bringing the total to $20.

articles.title: Appy Pie Now Allows Users to Create Mobile Apps with a 7-Day Free Trial
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Appy Pie has launched a 7-day free trial for its no-code app builder, allowing users to create and publish Android and iOS apps without upfront payment or providing credit card details.  This limited-time offer aims to make app creation more accessible to startups, students, and small businesses.

articles.title: The €1.25 Aldi Ireland buys that will ‘add a festive scent to your home' and it comes in three different scents
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland has introduced the Purewick Mini Candle (€1.25), Hotel Collection Luxury Glass Candle (€4.39), and Hotel Collection Reed Diffuser (€3.99) with various scents. Lidl Ireland is launching the Minky 3-Tier Heated Airer (€99.99) as a space-efficient clothes-drying solution.

articles.title: 9 New Hampshire Restaurants That Opened in October 2025
articles.author: Sean Mckenna
org: Raising Cane's Rock n Roll Meatballs
articles.summary: Several new restaurants opened in New Hampshire. Zeus Mediterranean Grill opened at the Mall of New Hampshire on October 28. Ellie's Kitchen in Salem opened on October 10 as a family-friendly pizza place. Other restaurants that opened include Blueberry Muffin Restaurant, Noble Ramen House, and Pho Street.

articles.title: This $180 Motorola phone has the display and battery to convince you to go budget
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Moto G Play, an affordable handset.

articles.title: NSLC to open its largest location in Dartmouth Crossing on Monday
articles.author: The Chronicle Herald
articles.summary: Nova Scotia Liquor Corp. (NSLC) will open its biggest retail location in Dartmouth Crossing on Monday. The new store features 20,000 square feet of retail space, an expanded stock of alcohol products, and a new cannabis outlet to be added in December.

articles.title: Ford Mustang Mach-E priced right, meeting sales expectations, says brand
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: Ford is providing customers with an electric version of the Mustang to celebrate its 60th year. The electric Mustang aims to deliver the same excitement, emotion, thrill, and design as the traditional Mustang, setting it apart from other mainstream EVs.

articles.title: 2026 Nissan Pathfinder facelift unveiled, Australian availability unknown
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Nissan has revealed a facelift for its fifth-generation Pathfinder SUV. The availability of this updated model in Australia is currently uncertain.

articles.title: Nissan launches locally developed, low-cost N6 plug-in hybrid in China
articles.author: Shizuka Tanabe
articles.summary: Nissan has opened preorders in China for its new N6 plug-in hybrid sedan. The company aims to boost sales of locally developed budget autos and eventually expand exports to Latin America and other parts of Asia.

articles.title: Huge change announced for Cheetos, Doritos coming next month
articles.author: Matt Durr
articles.summary: PepsiCo is launching a new product line called 'Simply NKD', which includes dye-free versions of Doritos and Cheetos. The new snacks will be available for pre-order now and in stores starting December 1st, offering consumers a choice without artificial flavors or dyes while maintaining the original taste and crunch.

articles.title: Amazon Haul launches in Canada with fashion, electronics, home and beauty items as low as $1
articles.author: Mike Pearson
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Amazon Haul, a new ultra-low-priced marketplace in Canada, offering hundreds of thousands of items for $25 or less. Available via the Amazon Shopping mobile app, Amazon Haul provides a fun and engaging shopping experience with free shipping options for orders over $35 and promises delivery within two weeks.

articles.title: Anticipating the Opening of the New Jollibee Location
articles.author: California Insights
articles.summary: Jollibee is expected to open a new branch. The new Jollibee branch will offer a new Korean BBQ chicken dish. The opening date is unconfirmed, sparking discussion among potential customers.

articles.title: Sri Lanka rolls out red carpet for luxury EV brand DENZA's first-ever South Asian launch
articles.author: Administrator
articles.summary: DENZA, BYD's premium NEV brand, launched in Sri Lanka on November 12, 2025, introducing the DENZA B8, DENZA B5, and DENZA D9 models. These new energy vehicles, including MPVs and electric vehicles, showcase luxury design and advanced NEV technology, incorporating features like BYD's Blade Battery and intelligent cockpit systems. JKCG Auto is the authorised distributor for DENZA.

articles.title: Scott & Jon's Expands to Whole Foods Market with Premium Lineup of Fresh-Tasting Fish Bowls
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Scott & Jon's is launching its seafood bowls nationally in Whole Foods Market starting Q4 2025. The lineup includes four high-performing seafood bowls, including a new Fish Tikka Masala offering. This launch reflects the company's commitment to delivering delicious seafood meals with high-quality ingredients.

articles.title: Chick-fil-A is testing out a new ‘chicken and waffles' mashup in two cities, here's where
articles.author: Emily Ann Jackman
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A is testing a new Chicken & Waffle sandwich in select locations in Maryland and Texas. The sandwich features crispy chicken between maple waffles with bacon and honey butter spread. The test aims to determine if the new item will be offered nationwide.

articles.title: DKMUL to launch seeds delight and guava chilli lassi at the coop week celebration
articles.author: TNN
articles.summary: DKMUL will launch two new products, Nandini Seeds Delight and Nandini Guava Chilly Lassi, on November 16th at the 72nd All India Cooperative Week. Nandini Seeds Delight, priced at Rs 10, contains seeds, almond, milk, ghee, and Khova, while Nandini Guava Chilly Lassi, priced at Rs 15, includes guava, chilli powder, and Nandini curd. On November 17th, DKMUL will distribute 43,000 packets of Seeds Delight and 23,000 packets of Lassi to customers at its franchises.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Type of Washcloth (OSW-132)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor from Pittsburg, Calif., has created the "PERFECT WASH," a new type of washcloth designed for more efficient and easier body washing. The invention is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers through InventHelp.

articles.title: MK Curtain Group Launches MK AI Care, An AI-powered Hair Care Technology
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: MK Curtain Group launched MK Ai Care, a smart lifestyle brand with an AI-powered hair care technology for automated relaxation. The system adjusts water temperature, pressure, and massage functions, as well as dries and treats hair automatically. The first MK Ai Care outlet is operating at OE Resort.

articles.title: REDMAGIC 11 Pro Gaming Smartphone review
articles.author: Khari Taylor
articles.summary: REDMAGIC has recently revealed the REDMAGIC 11 Pro smartphone, a next-generation successor to the REDMAGIC 10 Pro, which will soon be available for pre-order. This smartphone is the first consumer model with AI server-grade liquid metal cooling and features a 4.6 GHz Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, Adreno GPU, and a dedicated RedCore R4 chip for enhanced power and performance. The REDMAGIC 11 Pro also includes an 80-watt USB-C fast travel charger, and a complimentary case and starts at $749.99 USD.

articles.title: Leyo Rujera Introduces Innovative Wagyu Beef Tallow Cream Transforming Natural Anti-Aging Skincare
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Leyo Rujera has announced the release of its a non-greasy moisturizer. The moisturizer is formulated to redefine expectations of tallow-based skincare. This launch is a significant step forward for the company.

articles.title: Nuna Elevates Everyday Parenting With Its New Lightweight PIPA™ urbn Flex Car Seat and Stroller System
articles.author: Nuna Baby
articles.summary: Nuna launched the PIPA™ urbn flex system. The PIPA™ urbn flex system is a car seat and stroller all-in-one travel system.

articles.title: Telus unveils new cybersecurity service targeting future quantum threats
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Telus Corp. is launching a new cybersecurity service. This represents a new offering from the company in the cybersecurity domain.

articles.title: URBANAND launches on TikTok Shop U.S. with clinically proven Pure Perfection Cream
articles.summary: URBANAND, a K-beauty brand, launched its Pure Perfection Cream on TikTok Shop U.S. The Pure Perfection Cream is clinically proven to strengthen the skin barrier and offers deep hydration and protection against dryness. It's formulated with vegan and low-irritation ingredients.

articles.title: Leyo Rujera Introduces Innovative Wagyu Beef Tallow Cream Transforming Natural Anti-Aging Skincare
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Leyo Rujera has launched its Wagyu Beef Tallow Cream, a non-greasy, multifunctional moisturizer featuring grass-fed Wagyu tallow, niacinamide, shea butter, and vitamin E. Laboratory evaluations of the cream indicated up to a seventy-six-percent improvement in barrier strength following regular use. Manufactured in the United States, the product caters to consumers seeking sustainable and clinically backed skincare formulations for face, body, and scalp.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Multi-Purpose Cleaning Glove (OCC-1798)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has created the CLEANING SPONGE GLOVE, a new cleaning tool designed to improve efficiency and protect hands during various cleaning tasks. The invention is currently available for licensing or sale through InventHelp.

articles.title: Up Digital Revamps Edmonton SEO Service with New AI-Driven Optimization Framework
articles.summary: Up Digital has updated its Edmonton SEO service to focus on AI-driven optimization. This service helps local businesses appear more consistently in AI assistants and generative search platforms by improving website understanding and indexing by machine-learning systems. The updated service includes local entity optimization and audits to measure how well a business appears in AI-generated summaries.

articles.title: Dyson's supersonic hair dryer is £100 off for Black Friday
articles.author: Daisy Lester
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Supersonic Nural hair dryer last year and it is now available with a discount of £100 at John Lewis as an early Black Friday deal. The Dyson Supersonic marked Dyson's venture into beauty in 2016, with the Nural version being a hi-tech upgrade.

articles.title: Waldorf Welcomes Zaxby's Expansion Wave
articles.author: David M. Higgins II
articles.summary: Zaxby's opened its first Maryland restaurant in Waldorf on November 12, 2025, offering its signature chicken fingers and sauces. The location provides dine-in, drive-thru, curbside pickup, and online ordering via the Zaxby's app, along with delivery options like DoorDash and Uber Eats.

articles.title: 30 Travel Products You'll Wish You Had 10 Trips Ago
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new travel-related products and accessories. These include the AirFly Pro wireless transmitter for connecting to in-flight entertainment, the Beis backpack with its suitcase-like opening, and other items like a 3-in-1 foldable wireless charging pad and LeakLocks Toiletry Skins designed to enhance travel convenience and organization.

articles.title: I tried sourdough from Aldi, Asda, Tesco and Sainsbury's - one even beat Jason's
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: Aldi, Asda, Tesco, and Sainsbury's offer their own-brand sourdough bread, with prices ranging from £1.75 to £2.44. Tesco's sourdough, costing £1.75 with a Clubcard, emerges as the reviewer's favorite, highlighting its crust, flavor, and size. Jason's sourdough is a popular choice but faces competition from the supermarket alternatives.

articles.title: NEXA FLEX Revolutionizes American Vaping: New Edition Proudly Built in the USA, with Flavors
articles.author: Enid News
articles.summary: NEXA launched a new NEXA FLEX edition. This new model is built in the USA.

articles.title: "What a Confidence Booster:" SA Raves as Woman Celebrates New Car Worth R300K in Emotional Video
articles.author: Johana Mukandila
articles.summary: A woman in Mzansi received a new Omoda car, a vehicle known for its modern design and advanced features that's becoming popular among young professionals in South Africa. The unveiling event, captured on video, sparked widespread admiration and congratulatory messages across social media.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Smart Video Surveillance System (NJR-303)
articles.author: Invent Help
articles.summary: An inventor from North Brunswick, N.J., created the S N S DEVICE, a new video surveillance system. The S N S DEVICE captures passing vehicle information, driver or pedestrian incidents, and mail theft, enhancing street-level video surveillance capabilities beyond household doorbell cameras.

articles.title: Doritos and Cheetos dial back bright orange in new versions without artificial ingredients
articles.author: Corvallis Gazette-Times
articles.summary: Doritos Simply NKD and Cheetos Simply NKD are scheduled to be available in stores starting December 1st. These are new snack product offerings.

articles.title: Doritos and Cheetos dial back bright orange in new versions without artificial ingredients
articles.author: Dee-Ann Durbin
articles.summary: Doritos introduced a new version of its Nacho Cheese chips. This updated product is formulated without artificial colors or flavors, differentiating it from the original version.

articles.title: Doritos and Cheetos dial back bright orange in new versions without artificial ingredients
articles.author: Pepsi Co
articles.summary: Doritos and Cheetos are undergoing a makeover. The new Doritos will not contain artificial colors or flavors, signaling a product update by PepsiCo.

articles.title: Doritos and Cheetos dial back bright orange in new versions without artificial ingredients
articles.author: DEE-ANN DURBIN
articles.summary: Doritos and Cheetos are undergoing a makeover, suggesting a potential update or relaunch of these snack products by their respective parent companies.

articles.title: Doritos and Cheetos dial back bright orange in new versions without artificial ingredients
articles.author: Dee-Ann Durbin
articles.summary: Doritos and Cheetos, products of PepsiCo, are being revamped to exclude artificial colors and flavors. New versions of Doritos Nacho cheese chips are already available without artificial colors or flavors. The company aims to meet the increasing consumer demand for healthier options.

articles.title: New Aldi to open next week in Pittsburgh's Banksville neighborhood
articles.author: Julia Burdelski
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a new grocery store in Pittsburgh's Banksville neighborhood. The grand opening is scheduled for Thursday at 8:45 a.m., featuring gift bags for the first 100 customers and a sweepstakes for a $500 Aldi gift card. The store aims to provide affordable grocery options, with potential savings of nearly $4,000 annually compared to name brands.

articles.title: Durst P5 SMP: New Hybrid LED Inkjet Press Revealed
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Durst launched the P5 SMP, a new LED inkjet press designed for hybrid printing. The P5 SMP has a modular design that focuses on LED inkjet technology. The LED inkjet technology offers lower energy consumption, reduced heat generation, and the ability to print on a wider range of substrates.

articles.title: TicketsCandy Launches RSVP App to Capture Interest Before Ticket Sales Open
articles.summary: TicketsCandy has launched a new RSVP app designed to help event organizers gauge attendee interest before ticket sales begin. The app provides a customizable RSVP form, allowing organizers to collect contact details and estimate capacity. This helps organizers prepare more confidently, with early testing showing a potential increase of up to 25% more attendees once ticket sales are opened.

articles.title: The xtra reliable smartphone for South Africa's toughest conditions
articles.author: Content Supplied
articles.summary: HONOR has launched the HONOR X7d 5G smartphone, designed for durability and long battery life. The smartphone features SGS-certified Premium Drop Protection, a 6,500 mAh battery, water resistance, and an Instant AI Eraser button, starting at R3 999 and available in Desert Gold and Velvet Black.

articles.title: AI Browser Agents Radically Transform How We Use The Internet
articles.author: Bernard Marr
articles.summary: The article discusses the introduction of 'browser agents', a new generation of web browsers. These browsers, exemplified by ChatGPT Atlas, Opera Neon, and Comet from Perplexity, use AI to perform tasks such as research, travel arrangements, and shopping, marking a shift towards automated productivity engines. This suggests a launch of new products with AI-driven capabilities.

articles.title: The Latest Version of the Xiaomi Su7 Was Caught Red-Handed Speeding on the Road
articles.summary: Xiaomi is developing a facelift for its SU7 model. Photos on social media reveal the Xiaomi SU7 facelift prototype features a redesigned front lip.

articles.title: No perfume, no nonsense! These viral odor-erasing Dropps are the secret weapon for laundry that smells better than ever
articles.author: Julia Remillard
articles.summary: Dropps has launched the Odor Eraser Biobased Laundry Additive. This product utilizes TriCore EraseTM technology with DNase Enzymes, zinc, and a proprietary odor-fighting active to neutralize odors in laundry, rather than masking them. Testing shows that Dropps Odor Eraser is more effective than other leading brands.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chipset And 7,300mAh Battery Launched In India: ...
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 15 in India. The new phone features a flagship chipset, updated cameras without Hasselblad branding, and a large battery.

articles.title: SAP Makes Concessions to Allay EU Antitrust Concerns in Software Probe
articles.author: Wall Street Journal
articles.summary: SAP proposes new support service options for clients, including choices between different support-service providers and varying support levels, even the option for no SAP support.

articles.title: Launch Day Set For Stripped Down Versions Of Doritos, Cheetos: What To Know About Simply NKD
articles.author: Joe Lombardi
articles.summary: PepsiCo is launching Simply NKD, a new line of Doritos and Cheetos without artificial flavors or dyes, on December 1st. The new snacks offer the same flavors as the original versions but with a cleaner, natural look. Preorders for Simply NKD are available now.

articles.title: Debut Date Set For Stripped Down 'NKD' Versions Of Doritos, Cheetos
articles.author: Joe Lombardi
articles.summary: PepsiCo has launched Simply NKD, a new line of Doritos and Cheetos made without artificial flavors or dyes. The Simply NKD collection includes four flavors: Doritos Nacho Cheese, Doritos Cool Ranch, Cheetos Puffs, and Flamin' Hot Cheetos and preorders are available now before the Dec. 1 rollout. This launch caters to consumer demand for snacks with simpler ingredients, while maintaining the original flavors.

articles.title: Valve is making microSD cards the next game cartridges
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Valve will launch Steam Machine PC and Steam Frame VR headset in early 2026. These devices, running on SteamOS, support microSD cards, allowing users to transfer games directly from their Steam Deck. This feature aims to provide a convenient and cohesive gaming experience across Valve's hardware ecosystem.

articles.title: I found a £100 discount on the Dyson airwrap for Black Friday
articles.summary: Dyson is offering savings on the Airwrap i.d. hair styling device ahead of Black Friday. The product is available for both curly and straight hair types, suggesting a promotional push or highlighting specific features.

articles.title: including 'identical' L'Occitane dupe & energy-saving gadget
articles.summary: Lidl is introducing Deluxe D'Avignon Body Lotion and Body Wash priced at £3.99. Also Lidl has launched the Silvercrest Beige Dual Basket Air Fryer for £69.99, featuring dual cooking zones and preset settings. Additionally, Lidl offers winter clothing, including the CRIVIT Men's Beige Ski Jacket at a discounted price of £18.39 for Lidl Plus members.

articles.title: NVIDIA DGX Spark "AI Supercomputer" Delivers Solid Gaming Performance Too, Over 175 FPS In Cyberpunk 2077 With Path Tracing Thanks To DLSS 4 MFG
articles.summary: NVIDIA's DGX Spark, an AI Mini PC, delivers strong gaming performance, particularly in Cyberpunk 2077, leveraging DLSS 4 MFG. These Mini PCs represent a shift for NVIDIA, offering a desktop-grade PC experience.

articles.title: Alibaba Looks To Future With ChatGPT Inspired App And Tokenization
articles.author: Mark Faithfull
articles.summary: Alibaba Group is redesigning its AI app, Tongyi, and relaunching it as Qwen, aiming to build consumer revenue around AI. The revamped app will include new agent-style capabilities and shopping-related tools to draw more users. Alibaba intends to introduce an international version of Qwen and potentially charge for consumer services later.

articles.title: ‘Hey Gemini, help me edit…,' Google Photos rolls out six AI tools you should try
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Google Photos has launched six new AI tools, including 'Help me edit,' AI-powered templates, and an AI flaw correction tool, enhancing photo editing capabilities using natural language commands. The update also introduces the 'Ask Photos' feature for improved search and interaction, allowing users to locate photos with natural language queries.

articles.title: Meet Dana Rupe, the new director of the University of Iowa John Pappajohn Entrepreneurial Center
articles.author: Lisa Rossi
org: School of Journalism and Mass Communication
articles.summary: Dana Rupe, the new director of Iowa JPEC, focuses on democratizing entrepreneurship using AI tools. Iowa JPEC emphasizes modern programming, including the Venture School program, and aims to provide entrepreneurs with updated toolkits and resources. The center's objective is to enhance its existing curriculum and integrate innovative tools to support entrepreneurs.

articles.title: The Teaching Assistant Recommended I Use Deodorant Containing Aluminum
articles.author: California Insights
articles.summary: Social media users are recommending antiperspirants from brands such as Degree and Dove's Men Care to combat body odor. Users suggest alternating deodorants to maintain effectiveness. They also highlighted the importance of thoroughly drying the body before applying lotion and antiperspirant.

articles.title: AMAZE PARTNERS WITH PEREZ HILTON TO POWER HIS STOREFRONT WITH NEW 'AMAZE MOMENTS' AI ENGINE
articles.author: Stocktwits Inc
articles.summary: Amaze Holdings, Inc. launched Amaze Moments, an adaptive AI infrastructure that transforms cultural trends and fan data into real-time product collections. Perez Hilton is one of the first users to integrate Amaze Moments into his storefront to create exclusive merchandise. This new platform empowers creators to make data-informed decisions and build deeper connections with fans.

articles.title: Can Beehiiv Carve Out A Bigger Slice Of The Creator Economy?
articles.author: Alex Weprin
articles.summary: A creator-services company is launching an AI-powered website creator. The company is also launching commerce capabilities. Furthermore the company is launching podcast tools.

articles.title: Weekly Recap: 12 Consumer Press Releases You Need to See
articles.author: News Provided By
articles.summary: Wendy's introduced its first-ever "Frosty Day" as part of its consumer and retail announcements. This launch aims to attract consumers with a new offering within the food and beverage sector.

articles.title: PepsiCo bows to regulatory pressure with new 'naked' snacks
articles.author: Tags
org: Department of Health and Human Services
articles.summary: PepsiCo is introducing the 'Simply NKD' line of Doritos and Cheetos, which are dye-free versions of the snacks, in response to changing regulations. The new product line aims to provide the same taste without artificial colors and will be available at a premium price starting December 1st at Walmart. This launch represents a shift in the food industry driven by regulatory pressure rather than solely consumer demand.

articles.title: 38 Fun, Practical Products That May Be A New Obsession
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Eos introduced a limited-edition lip treatment and a new body lotion. Olay launched a limited edition body wash. Dawn brought back its limited edition holiday scent Powerwash Spray. Tree Hut released a Mistletoe Magic Hand Wash. Native launched Aluminum-Free Buttercream & Vanilla Deodorant. Medicube released Salmon Pink Collagen Capsule Cream. Death Wish Coffee launched Coconut Caramel Coffee Pods. Built introduced "Puff Protein Bars". Touchland released a special edition Confetti Cake Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer. Wet Brush launched a Glinda-themed Wet Brush. Birdie introduced an indoor carbon dioxide monitor.

articles.title: 'Excellent' £250 dehumidifier for drying laundry can be snapped up for £88 less
articles.author: Eleanor Fleming
articles.summary: Yimbly is offering a discounted SmartAir Dehumidifier, priced at £162 with a discount code, outcompeting Amazon and High Street TV. The dehumidifier can extract up to 20L of moisture daily, offering five settings and a 24-hour timer. Alternative dehumidifiers like Lakeland's De'Longhi and Debenhams' Geepas are also presented.

articles.title: 37 Clever Products That Prove You're A Smart Shopper
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Color Wow launched "Raise The Root" thickening and lifting spray. Plackers introduced disposable "Grind No More" Night Guards. New Kutsuwa highlighter pencils are introduced.

articles.title: How to use ChatGPT group chat feature: Step-by-step guide
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT launched a group chat feature allowing up to 20 users to collaborate in a single conversation. The feature is initially available as a pilot in Japan, New Zealand, South Korea, and Taiwan. Users joining the group chat need to set up a profile, and OpenAI assures that private memory won't apply, ensuring shared content is not stored.

articles.title: Self-service laundrette could be coming to Warwick supermarket
articles.author: James Smith
articles.summary: Tesco and Timpson Ltd have launched a joint venture to open a Johnson Laundry Kiosk at the Tesco store on Emscote Road. The kiosk will offer self-service laundry services and be available 24/7.

articles.title: Kidream.ai Emerges as All-in-One AI Entertainment Platform, Combining Short Dramas, Interactive Stories, and Games
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Kidream.ai, a new AI-powered entertainment platform, has launched, integrating short dramas, interactive storytelling, and casual gaming into a single user experience. The platform utilizes AI to generate content and enable personalized entertainment. It's available through its official website at https://www.kidream.ai/home.

articles.title: Surprise Amazon bundle cuts price of Kindle Colorsoft
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Kindle Colorsoft 16GB in a bundle with a Powerfast 9W Power Adapter for £210.68, a 30% saving compared to the recommended retail price. The Kindle Colorsoft features a seven-inch Colorsoft display, customizable settings, waterproof design, and optional Kindle Unlimited subscription, with an eco-conscious case available.

articles.title: Don't make this smart ring mistake, here's two I recommend instead
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Circular launched the Circular Ring 2, a new smart ring designed without requiring a subscription. The ring competes with other products in the market.

articles.title: OPPO Announced Apex Guard, Reaffirming Its Commitment to Next-Level Quality
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: OPPO introduced Apex Guard, a technology suite aimed at improving user experience through enhanced hardware and software quality. This launch signifies OPPO's commitment to raising industry standards and extending product lifespans. The unveiling took place at OPPO's global headquarters and R&D hub.

articles.title: Strutt Marks Milestone with 'Strutt Day,' Giving Media First Look at ev¹ Ahead of CES 2026 Premiere
articles.summary: Strutt is marking a milestone with 'Strutt Day' by providing the media with a first look at its new product, 'ev¹'. This preview is scheduled ahead of the CES 2026 premiere.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 vs iPhone 17: The key differences buyers should know before upgrading
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus launched its flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, in India. The new device is the successor to the OnePlus 13 and features Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Elite.

articles.title: Strutt Marks Milestone with 'Strutt Day,' Giving Media First Look at ev¹ Ahead of CES 2026 Premiere
articles.author: Strutt Inc
articles.summary: Strutt, a startup, hosted Strutt Day showcasing its STRUTT ev1 electric vehicle. The event included a hands-on demo for press and partners. This provides a preview before the official unveiling at CES 2026.

articles.title: Viu partners with agency for wider advertising opportunities
articles.author: The Philippine Star
articles.summary: InnovationOne collaborates with Viu to offer brands a new advertising avenue. The collaboration provides highly targeted and culturally relevant advertising placements. It also facilitates integrated omnichannel marketing campaigns.

articles.title: https://www.facebook.com/Primo.Boost.XL.Gummies.Reviews/
articles.summary: Primo Boost XL Gummies are introduced as a new product formulated to promote male sexual health. These gummies contain a blend of natural ingredients like herbs, vitamins, and minerals, known for their performance-enhancing properties. Unlike traditional pills, the gummies offer a convenient way to support men's sexual wellness.

articles.title: 'Red Dead Redemption' expands to new gen consoles, mobile platforms including Netflix
articles.author: Gma Integrated News
articles.summary: Rockstar Games is launching 'Red Dead Redemption' and 'Undead Nightmare' on iOS and Android devices on December 2, with Netflix subscribers gaining access. The games are also coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch 2 with free upgrades for some older console versions. All versions include the complete single-player experiences and bonus content.

articles.title: Cannabis Club Systems Launches AI-Powered Tools to Transform Product Discovery and Data Management
articles.summary: Cannabis Club Systems has launched SmartBud AI and SmartCore, two technologies designed to improve operations for cannabis clubs and dispensaries. SmartBud AI offers real-time product recommendations, while SmartCore ensures accurate product information across all retail channels. These technologies are reported to increase basket size and improve efficiency for early adopters.

articles.title: PepsiCo reveals new 'NKD' versions of Doritos and Cheetos
articles.author: Pop Culture
articles.summary: PepsiCo is launching a new product line called Simply NKD, featuring Doritos and Cheetos snacks without artificial dyes and flavors. The new line includes Doritos Nacho Cheese, Cool Ranch flavors, Cheetos Puffs, and Flamin' Hot varieties. Simply NKD snacks are currently available for pre-order and will be in stores on December 1.

articles.title: Motorola's Upcoming G76 Shows Up Online, Revealing Key Specs
articles.author: Afaq Wajdan Malik
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch its new Moto G76 smartphone, model XT2537. The device is expected to feature Qualcomm's Snapdragon 6s Gen 4 chipset, 8GB of RAM, and run Android 16. The Moto G76 may be a reworked version of the G100s and could include a 7,000 mAh battery and a 50 MP main camera.

articles.title: Augustinus Bader's The Elixir, Powered By Advanced TFC8 Technology
articles.author: Mansi Praharaj
articles.summary: Augustinus Bader has launched Elixir, a new skincare product featuring Advanced TFC8® technology. This formulation aims to rejuvenate the skin by enhancing communication between skin cells and accelerating the delivery of active ingredients, resulting in a visibly lifted, smoother, and more radiant complexion.

articles.title: DJI vs. Insta360: How China's AI-Driven Hardware Giants are Reshaping the Global Imaging and Drone Markets-钛媒体官方网站
articles.summary: Insta360 launched its Antigravity A1 panoramic drone in August 2025, challenging DJI's core market. Plaud introduced a voice recording and transcription device with embedded large language models, achieving significant sales after its 2023 Kickstarter launch. XbotGo released the Falcon | 4K AI Tracking Sports Camera, and Halliday Glasses, in partnership with Gyges Labs, launched AI-powered eyewear with advanced features.

articles.title: ​OnePlus 15 vs Apple iPhone 17: How the two flagship smartphones compare
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OnePlus launched its flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, in India, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and a 7,300 mAh battery. Priced from Rs 72,999, the OnePlus 15 competes with the Apple iPhone 17, which houses A19 chipset and starts at Rs 82,900.

articles.title: Review: OnePlus 15 is the poster boy of a revolution going on in smartphone battery technology
articles.author: Mathures Paul
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus 15, a new flagship smartphone featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, a 7,300 mAh battery with 120W SuperVOOC charging, a 165Hz display, and IP68/IP69K protection. The OnePlus 15 includes a triple-camera setup with a DetailMax Engine and can record 4K 120fps Dolby Vision HDR video.

articles.title: Property agents use AI images to sell homes in Singapore
articles.author: Teo Kai Xiang
articles.summary: PropertyGuru, PropNex, ERA Singapore and 99.co are property listing platforms that have started using AI to generate images of properties. These AI-generated images are used in property listings to make the properties more appealing to potential buyers or renters and to generate leads. Renderspace, an AI start-up, has developed a generative AI tool for virtually remodeling homes, which is used by realtors at PropNex and ERA. PropertyGuru uses an in-house AI-powered moderation tool to conduct automated monitoring of all listing images.

articles.title: Google Adds New ‘Images' Tab to Mobile App in Push Toward Personalized Visual Inspiration
articles.author: Jolyen
articles.summary: Google is launching a dedicated 'Images' tab in its mobile Search app for iOS and Android, providing users with a personalized feed of visual content. This new tab aims to help users gather visual ideas for tasks like trip planning and home decorating and will feature a curated image feed, search functionality, and the ability to save items to Collections.

articles.title: Samsung Reportedly Set to Release Its First Triple-Folding Phone in December
articles.author: Defara Dhanya
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to launch the Galaxy Z TriFold, a triple-folding phone, on December 5th. The phone will feature a 6.5-inch cover screen, a 10-inch inner screen, and a 5,600 mAh battery divided into three cells. The initial launch will be in limited quantities, priced high, and available only in select markets.

articles.title: Doritos and Cheetos Get Stripped of Artificial Colors and Flavors with New Launch
articles.author: Angel Saunders
org: U.S. Department of Health and Human Services
articles.summary: PepsiCo has launched a new product line called "Simply NKD" for Doritos and Cheetos, which are the classic snacks without artificial colors or flavors. Cheetos Simply NKD will be available in Puffs and Flamin' Hot, while Doritos Simply NKD snacks come in the classic Cool Ranch and Nacho Cheese flavors. These new products are available for pre-order and will be in stores starting December 1st.

articles.title: 39 Products So Amazing They Seem Magical
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: The article features a diverse range of new products, including Sol de Janeiro's Brazilian Bum Bum Cream for skin hydration and tightening, Dawn Powerwash for cleaning tough messes, and Tineco 2-in-1 vacuum and mop for efficient cleaning. Other highlighted products include Londontown's illuminating nail concealer for transforming nails and CeraVe Retinol Serum for reducing the appearance of pores and scars.

articles.title: I spent a week with the OnePlus 15, and it was full of surprises
articles.author: Nadeem Sarwar
articles.summary: OnePlus launched its latest flagship phone, the OnePlus 15. However, the launch has been unexpectedly delayed for the US market, and the phone's performance tuning is triggering debates.

articles.title: 33 Of The Best Practical Gifts To Give This Year
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The article presents a collection of gift ideas, including new products. It features the Always Pan, a 10-in-1 nonstick pan, Renpho percussion massager for muscle relief, an Instant Pot which acts as 7 kitchen appliances in one, Dash mini waffle maker for quick brunch, and Essence's Lash Princess Mascara as a makeup alternative to falsies. Also, the fifth-generation Echo Dot is mentioned as a personal assistant.

articles.title: The Aldi Pancake Mix That's Packing Serious Protein
articles.author: Marco Sumayao
articles.summary: Aldi offers Millville's Protein Pancake & Waffle Mix, containing 15 grams of protein per serving, available in classic buttermilk and chocolate chip flavors. The mix is affordable at $3.85 per box and can be used in various ways beyond breakfast, offering a convenient and high-protein option for multiple meals.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold key specs and features tipped online ahead of launch
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z TriFold smartphone, featuring a triple-folding design, a 6.5-inch outer screen with 2,600 nits brightness, and a 10-inch internal display with 1,600 nits. The device may also include a 200MP primary camera and is expected to launch with a Snapdragon chipset and a battery capacity between 5,437mAh and 5,600mAh, with a limited initial shipment.

articles.title: Head & Shoulders Shampoo Launches an Ice Cream Flavor in Thailand
articles.author: Apac Ad Junkie
articles.summary: Head & Shoulders, in collaboration with CJ WORX and Guss Damn Good, launched a new ice cream flavor called Cooling Blue Cream, Blue Salt in Thailand. The flavor is designed to mimic the cooling sensation of Head & Shoulders' Cool Menthol shampoo. On the launch day the product was sold out within hours.

articles.title: 22 Fall Impulse Buys That'll Leave You Feeling 100% Fulfilled And 0% Buyer's Remorse
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: Eos launched Crème de Pistachio Shea Better Body Lotion and Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. Dr Teal's introduced "Cozy Vanilla Season" Epsom salt, while Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day released "Fall Leaves" Hand Soap. Dossier launched "Ambery Vanilla" perfume, and Glamnetic introduced new press-on nails; Furthermore, Dawn presented Pumpkin Spice Powerwash Spray, Torani introduced pumpkin pie sauce, McCormick launched Finishing Sugar, and a hot cider reed diffuser was released.

articles.title: LG Electronics wins President's Award for transparent wireless TV, collects 28 design prizes
articles.author: Jeong Du-Yong
org: Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy
articles.summary: LG Electronics won 28 awards at the 2025 Good Design Product Selection, including the President's Award for the LG Signature OLED T, a transparent, wireless OLED TV. Other award-winning products include the LG AI Home IoT Package, LG Tromm AI Objet Collection WashTower, and LG StanbyME 2, demonstrating the company's innovative product designs.

articles.title: Tech discovery day offers first look at BYD hybrid pickup
articles.author: Cbt
articles.summary: BYD is preparing to launch its Shark 6 pickup truck in Malaysia. The Shark 6 is a plug-in hybrid with a 1.5-liter turbo engine and electric motors, outputting 436 horsepower, and offers 100km of EV range and a combined 800km range. It features off-road capabilities and is being showcased at the BYD Tech Discovery Day.

articles.title: WPP appoints Elav Horwitz as chief innovation officer
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: WPP appointed Elav Horwitz as its first chief innovation officer to lead applied AI initiatives. WPP also unveiled WPP Open Pro, the new edition of WPP's AI marketing platform, designed to put WPP's AI capabilities in the hands of clients and empower brands of all sizes to plan, create and publish campaigns independently.

articles.title: How To Pick and Use an AI Image Generator For Creative Work
articles.summary: Depositphotos AI Image Generator empowers users to create original images for social media, print materials, and product catalogs. The article suggests Depositphotos AI Image Generator as a tool for generating images for commercial purposes. The generated images align with the user's ad campaign and deliver the intended message.

articles.title: Schneider unveils advanced liquid cooling for NZ data centres
articles.summary: Schneider Electric launched advanced liquid cooling solutions in New Zealand. These solutions aim to meet the demands of AI data centers. The new products also enhance energy efficiency and sustainability.

articles.title: Cash App\u2019s Moneybot might know your spending habits better than you do
articles.author: The Scranton Times-Tribune
articles.summary: Moneybot, a next-generation chatbot, is being introduced. It utilizes 'agentic' AI technology.

articles.title: Susie Dent Unveils the Correct Pronunciations of Commonly Mispronounced Words
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: The article clarifies the correct pronunciations for several popular brands and products. For example, Nike's chairman specifies the pronunciation as 'NY-kee', aligning with the Greek goddess of victory, while Ginsters is pronounced with a hard 'g', and Porsche is 'Paw-shuh'. The article also highlights the correct pronunciation of food items such as Bruschetta ('brus-KETTA') and Chipotle ('chuh-POT-lay').

articles.title: You Won't Be Able To Live Without These 42 Products After Trying Them Once
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Eos Cashmere Body Oil leaves skin feeling soft and supple with a vanilla and caramel scent. Clinique Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm provides a lightweight, buildable tint complementing all skin tones. Nivea Lightweight Gel Cream, enriched with Q10, improves skin firmness with regular use, showing results in a few weeks.

articles.title: InnovationOne expands brand solutions through Viu Philippines
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: InnovationOne partnered with Viu Philippines to offer brands new targeted advertising and branded content options within Viu's library of Asian shows. This partnership provides brands with the opportunity to appear alongside content that audiences are emotionally invested in, as they stream and binge-watch.

articles.title: Aiffro Launches the World's First Mini Portable SSD For Lightning and Type-C, the P20, on Kickstarter
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A technology brand redefining portable storage has launched a groundbreaking product called the P20. This product is the world's first mini SSD compatible with both Lightning and Type-C interfaces. The P20 is designed to support workflows that move between phones, tablets, and computers.

articles.title: DENZA drives into Sri Lanka in South Asian debut
articles.summary: DENZA, BYD Group's premium NEV brand, has launched in Sri Lanka in partnership with JKCG Auto. The launch includes the introduction of the DENZA D9 luxury MPV, based on BYD's e-Platform 3.0, as well as the B5 and B8 models utilizing DM-O technology. DENZA's official showroom has been opened at The Shoppes, City of Dreams Sri Lanka.

articles.title: 37 Products That Make Simple Tasks Even Simpler
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: This article discusses the introduction of new innovative product and services. These include, for example, a gift wrap cutter, sink cleaner and polish, straw cleaners, foot peeling spray, air fryer cheat sheet, 3-in-1 charging cord, laundry stain remover, shower cleaner, wash bin, hard water stain remover, compression bag, veggie chopper, anti-fog reading glasses, curl brush, damp duster sponges, spa headband and wristband set, pet hair remover roller, toilet brush, jewelry-cleaning stick, salad pod, condiment fork, shoe washing machine bag, pasta strainer, garbage disposal cleaner, bracelet helper tool, microwave cover, dryer sheets, broom and dust pan set, rectangular Lazy Susan, electric candle lighter, silicone oven push rack tool, utility knife, bread bow knife, cookie scoops, Laundry Turtle, continuous oil sprayer, and a hair identifier spray.

articles.title: TOZO Launches NC20 Series: Elevating Wireless Listening with AI Assistance and Intelligent Control
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: TOZO announces the global debut of its NC20 Series True Wireless Earbuds. The new lineup blends cutting-edge audio innovation with smart AI integration. The TOZO NC20 Pro features a smart touchscreen charging case.

articles.title: Russian AI robot faceplants hard during grand Moscow reveal as ‘Rocky' theme blares
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: AIDOL, Russia's first anthropomorphic robot with artificial intelligence developed by AIDOL company, was launched. The robot experienced a malfunction during its debut, faceplanting and flailing on stage.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 vs iPhone 17: Price, display, battery and key specs compared
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: OnePlus launched its latest flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, in India. The device features a 6.78-inch display.

articles.title: 20 Teen-Approved Gifts So You Don't Look Like a Total Dork
articles.summary: Fujifilm launched the Instax Mini Link 3 printer for teens, producing credit-card-sized photos. Ugg introduced Classic Ultra Mini boots as both streetwear and loungewear. Lululemon offers the Dual Pouch Wristlet and Everywhere Belt Bag for carrying essentials. Glossier promotes Glossier You Doux Perfume and Glossier You Fleur, designed to create a unique fragrance for each wearer, while Summer Fridays offers Lip Oil, a lightly tinted, non-sticky lip product with a high-shine finish.

articles.title: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Elite headset review: Ultimate versatility, eye-watering cost
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: SteelSeries is launching the Arctis Nova Elite, a new headset targeted towards audiophiles. The Arctis Nova Elite aims to be the ultimate audiophile's headset.

articles.title: Watch 'Now You See Me: Now You Don't' bucket make popcorn 'disappear'
articles.author: Usatoday
articles.summary: To celebrate the release of "Now You See Me:" film franchise, a new popcorn bucket featuring a magical illusion was launched. The bucket has the capability of making popcorn "disappear."

articles.title: Introducing NIOS Swagger API with OpenAPI Specification: Faster Integration and Automation (Infoblox Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Infoblox introduces NIOS Swagger API support to enhance network automation. The new API provides an easier method for developers to discover, test, and integrate Infobox NIOS DDI APIs in their automation processes.

articles.title: Lies of P Developer is Also Working on a Life Sim, and a 'Survival Action ...
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: NEOWIZ is developing multiple projects, including a sequel to Lies of P, with four titles planned for release by FY 2026. The company is also working on expanding the global IPs of Cats & Soup.

articles.title: Amazon Haul launches in Canada with fashion, electronics, home and beauty items as low as $1
articles.author: Mike Pearson
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Amazon Haul in Canada, a new marketplace offering hundreds of thousands of items for $25 or less. Available within the Amazon Shopping mobile app, Amazon Haul provides affordable options and is expected to compete with other low-priced goods platforms. Amazon Haul will be rolled out to all Canadian customers over the next few weeks.
